message.content: I wanna create a context engineer. An engineer that analyzes the context of the prompt and prepare it before returning to the main LLM flow. I wanna do it on top of ultracontext. Read: ultracontext folder to learn the building blocks. Then, we wanna use the context engineer to get relevant context on the transcriptions folder generated by transcribee (https://github.com/itsfabioroma/transcribee).
